entry.name: Admin
entry.content:
Bootrax was created using a mixture of PHP and XSL templates.The XML used for these templates is produced from directory accessed XML files

App Directories & Page Variables

Page Variables

Variables available to page templates

  • {$sitename} => 'bootrax-lite'
  • {$root} => http://{DOMAIN NAME}/{$sitename}
  • {$homepageslug} =>'home'
App Directories
{pagename} is also the title of the page so becareful when naming your directory
Home ->
  • assets
    • css
    • images
    • JS
    • templates
      • {pagename}
        • data.xml (contains all the data relative to tha page)
        • load.php (contains all the processing code to produce the page with all params and template)
        • page.xsl (contains the the templating code)
        • config.php (contains the extra page variables for each page)
      • master.xsl (contains the main template for including all css js and creating the outerbody tags)
  • lib
    • functions
    • nav
    • not-found
    • page_templates
      • data.xml
      • load.php
      • page.xsl
      • config.php

The inspiration for this application came from the eforts to try and find a faster and quicker developing alternative to using a CMS.
